name: decomplect
body:
> Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. - Leonardo Da Vinci

### Decomplect
At [decomplect](name.html), we strive to make software 'simple'. We are inspired by [Rich Hickey](http://www.infoq.com/presentations/Simple-Made-Easy) - the creator of the Clojure programming language. 

### What We Do
We work with businesses to help solve problems and remove bottlenecks. We use lean and eXtreme Programming practices to help deliver software on-time, on-budget with a focus on time to market and experimentation to find product-market fit.

### Our People
Sahil Muthoo, Mohit Thatte

### Get in Touch
We work out of Pune, India. Do get in touch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
